28.2.2 Any Participating Player who is eligible to represent more than one (1) Football Association on account of his citizenship of one (1) country (e.g. a Chinese citizen may be eligible to represent three (3) different Member Associations) and wishes to participate in the Competition utilising the nationality of a Member Association must demonstrate one (1) of the following:

28.2.2.1.that he has participated in an official competition for a representative
team of the relevant Member Association; or

28.2.2.2.that he was eligible to participate for a representative team of
the relevant Member Association in accordance with the FIFA
Regulations Governing the Application of the Statutes at least one
(1) year before MD1 of the Group Stage of the Competition.

Tak lama setelah mencoret Bruce Djite, manajemen segera bergerak mencari pengganti. Adalah Alessandro Ferreira Leonardo menjadi pilihan. Ia dikontrak selama putaran kedua Liga 1 2018.

CEO PT PSM Munafri Arifuddin mengatakan bahwa pihaknya tidak asal merekrut Sandro, sebab semua butuh pertimbangan matang.

"Pertama, mencari striker Asia itu tidak gampang, apalagi dengan tenggat waktu seperti ini. Jadi kita harus maksimalkan yang siap saja."

"Kemudian dalam proses itu, kami juga melihat jejak rekamnya, CV-nya dan semuanya. Sehingga kami sampai pada kesimpulan akhir, bahwa Sandro cocok untuk tim." [Tribunnews.com]

Shortly after crossing out Bruce Djite, the management immediately moved in search of a replacement. Alessandro Ferreira Leonardo is the choice. He was contracted during the second round of League 1 2018.

CEO of PT PSM Munafri Arifuddin said that his side did not recruit Sandro, because all need careful consideration.

"Firstly, looking for an Asian striker is not easy, especially with a deadline like this, so we have to maximize what is ready."

"Then in the process, we also saw his track record, his CV and everything, so we came to the final conclusion, that Sandro is suitable for the team." [Tribunnews.com]
